name: Paid Marketing Manager/Head (remote)
description:
We have built and launched a neobank in the European Union from scratch, and now over 500,000 people from more than 100 countries have pre-ordered ZELF cards. We hire remotely, it doesn't matter to us where you are - in Russia, Ukraine or Belarus, if you are cool, responsible, know how to work in a team and are ready to change the world.

We are looking for Paid Marketing Manager/Head. It is a critical role within the Growth team as you are responsible for creating and delivering the campaigns to grow ZELF even faster over the next few years.

What you'll be doing:

  • Acquiring and retaining new customers in key international markets;
  • Ensuring best possible spent optimization based on learnings from multiple A/B tests across creatives, targets and other strategies;
  • Managing full-cycle execution of campaigns, working with creative, copywriting and brand to ensure consistent brand messages and get promotional assets approved;
  • Managing a budget, allocating a proper spending across all channels, continuously working on enhancing the ROI;
  • Oversee key agency and business partner relationships.

What you have:

  • Minimum of 3-5 years of business experience in digital or performance marketing in a fast scaling startup or agency;
  • Entrepreneurial mindset, relentless focus on delivering results and ROI;
  • Demonstrated capabilities of effective budget allocation (min $50,000) to appropriate channels month over month;
  • In-depth knowledge of paid social including Facebook/Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube;
  • Experience with best practice A/B testing;
  • Strong aptitude for numbers and extreme comfort with data analysis.

We offer:

  • The opportunity to get into an international company "on takeoff" and create a really interesting product;
  • Work in a cool team of specialists from MDM-Bank, Alfa-Bank, Yandex, Rambler, L'Oréal, Gazfond, Kaluga Astral;
  • You can work remotely from anywhere in the world;
  • Receive a good salary in foreign currency and its growth along with the growth and development of the company;
  • We also value initiative - this means that you will not only work in a super-flexible and modern fintech project, but become one of the engines of new ideas.
